title: Watering Wisdom
description: Always check the top inch of soil before watering. If it feels dry, it's time to water; if damp, wait another day or two. Overwatering is the number one plant killer!

title: Sunlight Secrets
description: Most indoor plants thrive in bright, indirect light. Direct midday sun can scorch leaves. Rotate your plants weekly for even growth and shape.

title: Fertilizing Frequency
description: Feed your plants primarily during the spring and summer growing seasons. Use a balanced liquid fertilizer at half-strength every 4-6 weeks, and skip it in winter.
